PHRASE.LANG: kName
Molded Edomae Sushi
Sushi à la mode d’Edo couverts de moisissure
Sushi nach Edo-Art mit Schimmeln
Sushi in stile Edo ammuffito
Sushi al estilo de Edo con moho
カビの生えた江戸前寿司
곰팡이가 생긴 에도마에스시
Molded Edomae Sushi
發霉的江戶壽司
發霉的江戶壽司
Molded Edomae Sushi
kDesc
Molded and inedible hand-rolled sushi. It stinks so much that even the spirits have to pinch their noses? [#Legal]
Sushi immangeables, couverts de moisissure. Puent trop même pour un monstre.[#Legal]
Ungenießbare handgerollte Sushi mit Schimmeln. Sogar Monster denken, dass es stinkt.[#Legal]
Del sushi preparato a mano ammuffito, non più commestibile. È troppo puzzolente persino per i mostri. [#Legal]
Sushi enrollado no comestible con moho. Incluso un monstruo piensa que apesta.[#Legal]
カビが生えてしまって食べられなくなってしまった握り寿司。モノノケ達さえ鼻をつまむ？[#Legal]
곰팡이가 피어서 먹을 수 없게 된 초밥. 요괴들까지도 코를 감싸쥘 것 같은데? [#Legal]
Molded and inedible hand-rolled sushi. It stinks so much that even the spirits have to pinch their noses? [#Legal]
發了霉而不能吃的手握壽司，氣味難聞，就連妖怪也退避三舍？[#Legal]
發了霉而不能吃的手握壽司，氣味難聞，就連妖怪也退避三舍？[#Legal]
Molded and inedible hand-rolled sushi. It stinks so much that even the spirits have to pinch their noses? [#Legal]
